content: Sterling B2Bi is in containment for MFT feeds. No additional MFT request will be completed for Sterling B2Bi. Starting 11/12 all new and existing MFT requests will be setup on Axway B2Bi.
DO NOT SETUP ANY MEETINGS WITH B2B TEAM MEMBERS
B2B team will request details and meetings as needed. Given the high number of applications and partners we support, we will NOT be able to accommodate meetings with every team.
Managed File Transfers (MFTs) have a 1.5 â€“ 2 Sprints delivery SLA
